home.title: QR Menu
home.bottom: Open up a new way for your customers to explore gastronomic delights with our menu!

about.title: Digital QR Menu
about.text:
Our app offers an excellent solution! We turn ordinary menu text into intuitive photos and short dish descriptions.

The presence of a QR menu with photos increases the average order amount. When guests can see appetizing photos of dishes and read about their ingredients and features, it makes the selection process more attractive and encourages them to order more dishes or additional drinks.

list.title: Visualization
list.text: Customers can view the menu by scanning the QR code on the restaurant table. No need to wait for a waiter.

list.title: Multilingual
list.text: Convenient menu language change - more guests, including foreigners.

list.title: Quick Search
list.text: If the menu is extensive, the search will help the customer easily find what they need or get the necessary recommendations.

list.title: Recommendations
list.text: Your customers will have the opportunity to leave their feedback, helping others make their choice easier.

list.title: Informativeness
list.text: Your customers will receive more additional information about the restaurant (social networks, Wi-Fi password, and contact information).

list.title: Appetite Boost
list.text: Photos increase appetite - higher average check.

list: The ability to post QR menu in your social networks
Unlimited number of categories and items

Ability to mark vegetarian and spicy dishes

Ability to specify additional information (address, phone, Wi-Fi password, social networks)
